Name: Simvastatin (Zocor)
Usage: Lowering high cholesterol and triglyceride levels.
Reducing the risk of heart attack, stroke, and other heart-related complications in people with heart disease or at high risk of heart disease.

Uncommon Side Effects: Liver problems (symptoms may include dark urine, yellowing skin/eyes)
Severe muscle problems (rhabdomyolysis), which can lead to kidney damage
